column4: where can i get some more download urls to try for edgy?  the official one looks like it's capped at 555KB/s
I can't unblock the ports on the routers I'm behind.. torrents go at 3 KB/s if i'm LUCKY
then be happy with 555 kB/s; it's quite fast (I have a 256 kbps = 32 kB/s connection, so my opinion might not matter to you) :-)
